description: Andou Mamoru is a bespectacled, fat man who forms and alliance with Kaiji and Furuhata after losing all of his gesture cards. Unlike Furuhata, Andou is more opportunistic and tried to backstab the group within minutes of it forming. He usually has to have Kaiji`s strategies explained to him by Furuhata. After the gamble of Restricted Rock, Paper, Scissors ends, he betrays Kaiji, and has no regrets about it.
name: Andou Mamoru
